roi_calculation: Very High - Prevents critical security flaws and enables CI/CD.
infrastructure_setup: CI/CD pipeline with Emulator Suite integration.
success_metrics: 98% pass rate for security rule tests; Automated regression suite for login/registration.
risk_factors: Complexity of setting up Emulator Suite in CI.
business_value: Enables confident and secure releases from day one.

roi_calculation: High - Reduces manual regression testing for mobile features by 70%.
infrastructure_setup: Device farm integration (e.g., Firebase Test Lab).
success_metrics: Automated E2E tests for check-in/out (online/offline) and approval workflows.
risk_factors: Test flakiness on different devices/OS versions.
mitigation_strategies: Implement robust test retry logic; Run tests on a controlled set of emulators/devices.
business_value: Ensures core business workflows are stable.

roi_calculation: Medium - Automates complex data validation and filtering scenarios.
infrastructure_setup: Web driver setup in CI for headless browser testing.
success_metrics: Automated regression suite for all major admin reports and CRUD operations.
mitigation_strategies: Use stable, test-specific identifiers in the web app code.
business_value: Ensures reliability of administrative and data analysis tools.
